text: @realDonaldTrump I see multiple times in a day @realDonaldTrump is reciting ‘Sleepy Biden’ ....was he not sleeping and snoring when Coronavirus was trying to get foothold in America...why is he not talking nowadays of public dying of this just cause he can’t win election on that basis this Nov!!
